comment.author: 34632809@N00
comment._content: "Kimberly Crest" in the metadata above may refer to the extant house in Redlands, California, not Los Angeles. This does look like it could be the private pine-lined road leading up from Highland Ave to the house, located at 1325 Prospect Drive, Redlands, CA 92373.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you for following up on the note "possibly Kimberly Crest"!   The identity was confirmed, and the photo has a new title and site history note. -- Helena
